segments.text: I see a girl standing patiently on the kitchen floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's positioned close to a boy who is reaching for cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her arm is raised, palm open, signaling her readiness to receive.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her eyes are fixed on the cookie jar, full of expectation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She seems entirely focused on the boy's progress, not a flicker of distraction.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This must feel like an eternity, waiting for her share of the prize.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can almost feel her longing for one of those delicious cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a sweet moment of shared conspiracy between the two children.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's not touching the stool, maintaining a safe distance, but is clearly involved.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she's envisioning the taste of the warm, fresh cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: There's an innocence in her eager posture that's quite touching.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Itâ€™s a tiny bit heartbreaking to think of her disappointment if they get caught.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they manage to get some cookies without any trouble.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The quiet tension in her stance is quite remarkable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's a perfect accomplice, silently supportive of the mission.
segments.speaker: PAR
